sections.heading: 01|Emergency interim government definitions
sections.text: Effective:September 30, 1963Latest Legislation:Senate Bill 199 - 105th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in sections161.01to161.29, inclusive, of the Revised Code, and unless otherwise clearly required by the context:(A) "Unavailable" m

sections.heading: 29, inclusive, of the Revised Code shall be in effect only in the event that an attack upon the United States, as defined in section161
sections.text: 01of the Revised Code, has occurred, and shall remain in effect until terminated by joint resolution of the general assembly.
